cgcloud__Tactic_Fund__c.name: cgcloud__Tactic_Fund__c
cgcloud__Tactic_Fund__c.description: This object stores the relationship between the Fund and Payment Tactic junction objects.

cgcloud__Active_Tactic__c.description: Indicates whether the referred tactic is included.

cgcloud__Calculated_Funding_Percent__c.description: Funding Percent value that's calculated based on the Plan Spend amount that's allocated to the Tactic Fund and Total Plan Spend amount for the tactic. It is used when the Fund Auto-Determination option is disabled.

cgcloud__Funding_Percent__c.description: Value that drives amount distribution for the fund.

cgcloud__LE_Spend__c.description: Tactic-level spend KPI that's synced to this tactic fund record (restricted to the product spend of the fund's anchor product).

cgcloud__Liabilities__c.description: Tactic-level liabilities KPI that's synced to this tactic fund record (restricted to the product spend of the fund's anchor product).

cgcloud__OI_Costs__c.description: Tactic-level costs that appear on invoices, and the KPI is synced to this tactic fund record (restricted to the product spend of the fund's anchor product).

cgcloud__Phase__c.description: Represents the phase field on the Promotion object.

cgcloud__Plan_Spend__c.description: Tactic-level planned spend KPI that's synced to this tactic fund record (restricted to the product spend of the fund's anchor product).

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the Tactic Fund Record for related custom lists.

cgcloud__Tactic_Type__c.description: Reads Tactic Type off of related Tactic record; helpful for reporting purposes.

cgcloud__Unaccrued_Costs__c.description: Subtracts the Tactic Fund Liabilities value from the LE Spend value.
